name: Jam to the future
description:
A game inspired on the classic BACK TO THE FUTURE where you have to reach 88mph to not be stuck in the past!!!

Do not forget to catch Plutonium cells to restore energy!!!

INSTRUCTIONS:

This is a mouse based game!

Press on the car to accelerate and drag the Plutonium cells to the car to recover the flux capacitor battery!

I have a YOUTUBE Channel called Tales of a Game Dev, so make sure to check me there and if you like it, subscribe to it =D
